articles.description: Banking shares have outperformed the broad market and most sector indices in the past three months on the back of growing optimism over balance sheet growth
articles.content:
Banking stocks have been on fire over the past three months, driving the gains of the broader market, and have been second only to fast-moving consumer goods stocks in terms of gains.
For perspectiv… [+4256 chars]
